title: 8 Tips For Dry Climate Gardening Without Irrigation (Dust Mulch Wide Spacing Hugelpaths Etc.)

subtasks: Use wood chips as mulch and weed suppressant
Create hugel paths with rotted wood
Use mulch and dust mulch to conserve water
Use荷兰土表层覆盖以保持土壤湿度
Plant in mounds/hills to reduce competition and manage soil moisture
Pre-germinate seeds before planting to increase germination success
